world.name: Kek of Shadows
world.history: In the ancient realm of Kek, a shadow fell when the Dark Shard shattered, unleashing chaos. Four races—Humans, Elves, Dwarves, and Orcs—unite to restore balance.

factions.name: Order of Light
factions.description: Defenders of peace, led by Humans and Elves.

factions.name: Iron Clan
factions.description: Dwarven and Orcish warriors seeking dominance.

locations.name: Town
locations.description: A bustling hub of trade and safety, protected by ancient wards.

locations.name: Wilderness
locations.description: A dangerous land where Goblins and Wolves roam freely.
